1.text: Pour 4 cups (560g) of grains into a large bowl.

2.text: Add 1 cup (120g) of chopped nuts to the grains.

3.text: Mix in 1 cup (150g) of dried fruit.

5.text: Store the muesli in an airtight container.

6.text: Serve your muesli with milk or yogurt.

8.text: Toast the grains and nuts together.

10.text: Store your muesli with a vanilla pod.

11.text: Combine the oats and dried fruit in a bowl.

12.text: Cover the oats with apple juice and soak overnight.

14.text: Combine the oats with the apple and a splash of milk.

15.text: Serve the muesli with chopped almonds and a dollop of yogurt.
